trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_SEQ_00<tab>Y'shtola wears a haunted expression, Emet-Selch's words having clearly found their mark.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Almet.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Runar.

TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_THANCRED_000_000<tab>The eldest and most powerful of primals... Gods. If that were Hydaelyn's origin, then what would that make─ ...No. No, I will not take the words of an Ascian on trust. It has to be a lie.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_RYNE_000_005<tab>Thancred did tell me about primals...but I don't fully understand what all of this means.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_URIANGER_000_010<tab>'Tis oft said truth is a matter of perspective. Yet upon <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var> matter, there can be but one truth. I only pray it is not his.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_015<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you are returned! But...something troubles you. Is aught amiss?
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_UIMET_000_020<tab>What has happened to the sky!? I have never seen anything like it!
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_CYMET_000_025<tab>The sky, it...it is beautiful.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_030<tab>Though recent events plainly warrant further discussion, I think it best that we wait until Alphinaud and the others are present.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_031<tab>...Emet-Selch included. How convenient that he should choose this moment to keep to the shadows.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_032<tab>Well...no matter. For the present, we should return to Fanow and make certain of the Eulmorans' withdrawal.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_033<tab>After that, Slitherbough. The Blessed are no doubt elated by what has become of the sky.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_040<tab>You are returned. And unharmed, I see.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_041<tab>Indeed. I am pleased to report that the Lightwarden is no more, thanks in large part to you.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_042<tab>That the death of a single sin eater should make such a difference...
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_043<tab>As our numbers waned, so too did our hope that the ruins we have devoted our lives to guarding would ever find purpose.

TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_044<tab>Yet here you are, the allies for whom we have waited these many centuries. And with your arrival came the chance to pass on our legacy─the ancient wisdom of the empire.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_045<tab>That alone would have been reward enough... Never did we imagine it would serve to banish the Light that pervaded these woods.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_046<tab>On behalf of the Viis, our forebears, and the late emperor of Ronka, you have our deepest thanks.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_047<tab>It is we who should be thanking you. Our journey through the Qitana Ravel proved...most enlightening.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_048<tab>To be privy to such knowledge is an honor. One for which we never hoped...
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_CYMET_000_049<tab>Please, you need not be so humble!
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_050<tab>We but do our duty as decreed by the late emperor. Would that he were still with us to express his gratitude in person.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_UIMET_000_051<tab>But Sister, does this not mean our duty is fulfilled?
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_052<tab>To our allies, perhaps, but the ruins cannot be left unguarded.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_053<tab>So long as we live here in these woods, the secrets of Ronka must not fall into the wrong hands.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_RYNE_000_054<tab>Is Runar still here?
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_055<tab>No, we escorted him back to Slitherbough shortly after you set out.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_056<tab>If you would return to the Night's Blessed, we will not keep you any longer. I suspect they would be glad of your company.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_YSHTOLA_000_057<tab>Thank you, Almet. I look forward to a day when we might share a more leisurely visit to the ruins of Ronka.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_058<tab>We will await your return, then.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_ALMET_000_060<tab>Should you have need of the wisdom of Ronka again, you know where to find us.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_UIMET_000_065<tab>Be it a year from now or ten, we look forward to your return.
TEXT_LUCKMC120_03341_CYMET_000_070<tab>Perhaps someday we will visit your home instead.
